entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -19.8°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
